Text.Page:
The noctenium extractors! These beasts keep destroying them!

How are we supposed to get that precious noctenium if they keep destroying our extractors? You have to drive out those beasts!

Support your fellow Free Traders! If level 65 members help lower level alliance members in this task, I'll give them this bonus reward!

Thank you, !

More noctenium for us! The Free Trade Collective is on its way to the top!
